name: MoPub-AdMob-Adapters
summary: Google Adapters for mediating through MoPub.
description:
Supported ad formats: Banner, Interstitial, Rewarded Video, Native.

To download and integrate the Mobile Ads SDK, please check this tutorial: https://developers.google.com/admob/ios/download.


For inquiries and support, please utilize the developer support forum: https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/google-admob-ads-sdk/.
